name: Pucca Noodle Rush
storyline: You control Pucca who is in charge of customer service, which means seating customers, taking orders, serving up, clearing tables, pocketing the cash and chasing away the ninjas hired by meddlesome rivals. Nothing’s ever that simple though, and Pucca has to move even faster than when she’s chasing the long-suffering Garu to win the day. There are countless split second decisions to make when seating customers: prioritize friends, loyal customers, and take rivalries and thorny personalities into account to avoid trouble. And if anyone is kept waiting, it could be the final noodle for Pucca and her uncle!
summary: Similar to other diner dash games, controlling, running and time-managing a noodle restaurant with the loveable Pucca. Customers are catered to and the restaurant is customizable.
